name: Approval Request Escalated (Requester)
description: Sent to the approval requester when an approver (or approvers) have not actioned on an approval request for an admin-configured amount of time.
subject: An Approval Request#if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '' && $requester.identityID  != $__recipient.id) Submitted On Your Behalf#else By You#end Has Been Escalated
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

An approval request for $approvalName was submitted #if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '' && $requester.identityID != $__recipient.id) on your behalf by $requester.name #else by you #end and has not been actioned for $escalationDelay. This approval request has now been escalated #if($previousApprover.name && $previousApprover.name != '') from $previousApprover.name #end to $escalatedApprover.name.

To take action on or view the status of your approval requests please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$requesterPath


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
